channel.title: Findings Workflows on DefectDojo Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Findings Workflows on DefectDojo Documentation

item.title: Bulk Editing Findings
item.description: Findings can be edited in bulk from a Finding List, which can be found either on the Findings page itself, or from within a Test.

item.title: Creating Findings Manually
item.description: Normally, most of the Findings in your environment will be imported from other security tools. If you wish, you can add manual Finding entries as well, if you have vulnerabilities or work you wish to manage that was not created from a scan tool.

item.title: Editing Findings
item.description: If you want to add notes or update the language on a Finding to be more relevant to the current situation, you can do so through the Edit Finding form.

item.title: How-To: Manage Duplicate Findings
item.description: One of DefectDojo’s strengths is that the data model can accommodate many different use-cases and applications. You’ll likely change your approach as you master the software and discover ways to optimize your workflow.
